content: @Nathan Davis https://stackoverflow.com/questions/68083696/covid-19-diagnostic-test-in-fhir-format - I looked at the covid IG but it's not easy to explain to a beginner, and the covid IG doesn't have examples? Can you answer this?

@Grahame Grieve Yes I'll take a look at the question on stackoverflow and answer it best I can.
BTW, I'm working on creating examples for the Logica COVID-19 IG. I hope to have them ready and get them published as soon as we get our publishing issues worked out.
